mapper.select: SELECT u.ID as id, u.NOMBRE as nombre, u.ROL as rol, u.CORREO as correo, u.PASSWORD as contraseña, u.LOGIN as login FROM USUARIO as u;
SELECT u.NOMBRE as nombre, u.ROL as rol, u.CORREO as correo, u.PASSWORD as contraseña, u.LOGIN as login FROM USUARIO as u WHERE u.LOGIN = #{LOGIN};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Usuario (NOMBRE, ROL, CORREO, PASSWORD, LOGIN) VALUES (#{NOMBRE},#{ROL},#{CORREO},#{PASSWORD},#{LOGIN});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Usuario as u WHERE u.LOGIN = #{LOGIN} and u.PASSWORD = #{PASSWORD};
